content: Do you know any jokes about laundry mishaps?

As an AI language model, I don't have personal experiences or emotions, so I've never experienced any laundry mishaps myself. But I can certainly try to come up with a joke about it! Here goes:

Why did the shirt go to school?

Because it wanted to improve its folding techniques!

Hope that brings a smile to your face! Laundry can be such a mundane task, but maybe a little humor can make it more bearable.
